testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on "Signup / Login" button........................................passed And Verify "New User Signup!" is visible....................................passed And Enter name and email address............................................passed And Click "Signup" button...................................................passed And Verify that "ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION" is visible......................passed And Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth...............passed And Select checkbox "Sign up for our newsletter!"...........................passed And Select checkbox "Receive special offers from our partners!".............passed And Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed And Click "Create Account button"...........................................passed And Verify that this "ACCOUNT CREATED!" is visible..........................passed And Click that "Continue" button............................................passed And Verify that Logged in as username is visible............................passed And Click Delete Account button.............................................passed Then Verify that "ACCOUNT DELETED!" is visible and click 'Continue' button..passed
